text:
Instructions: You will be assigned one of three clients to help. In this tab, you will find several questions.

1. Drag each tile by its 6 dots into your workspace.

2. Go to your assigned client's tab to learn more about your task.

Once tiles are in your workspace, they will become editable and you can replace the sample text with your own ideas.

Task 1

Drag the information about your client to your workspace.

Task 2

Interpret and restate the client's end goal in you own words.

{In my own words, the client wants to ....}

Task 3

What assumptions will you make to help the client? Why? Include assumptions both about variables and about the context.

  • {I will assume ... because ...}
  • {I will assume ... because ...}
  • {I will assume ... because ...}

Task 4

Create variable chips for your client to use in their model. You can either create the variable chips in this tile, or create them in the previous tiles next to their assumptions.

Task 5

Describe in words how your variables are related to each other and/or will help you answer your client's questions
